00073 int mnt_UmntAll(nfs_arg_t *parg,
00074                 exportlist_t *pexport,
00075                 fsal_op_context_t *pcontext,
00076                 nfs_worker_data_t *pworker,
00077                 struct svc_req *preq,
00078                 nfs_res_t *pres)
00079 {
00080   LogDebug(COMPONENT_NFSPROTO, "REQUEST PROCESSING: Calling mnt_UmntAll");
00081 
00082   /* TODO: This should clear all mounts for the calling client, using
00083    * nfs_Remove_MountList_Entry(hostname, NULL)
00084    */
00085   /* Just empty the Mount list, take void as argument and returns void */
00086   if(!nfs_Purge_MountList())
00087     {
00088       /* Purge mount list failed */
00089       LogCrit(COMPONENT_NFSPROTO,
00090               "UMOUNT ALL: Error when emptying the mount list");
00091     }
00092 
00093   return NFS_REQ_OK;
00094 }                               /* mnt_UmntAll */
